## Resource Details

**Resource Name:**
*Provide the official name of the organization, clinic, or program.*

**Resource Type:**
*(Check all that apply)*
- [ ] Testing Center
- [ ] Youth-Friendly Clinic
- [ ] Mental Health Service
- [ ] PrEP Provider
- [ ] Educational Material / Website
- [ ] Other (please describe)

**Location:**
*City, State/Province, Country. If online-only, specify "Online".*

**Contact Information:**
*Phone number, email, or other contact details. If none, write "None".*

**Website / Social Media Link:**
*URL where more information can be found.*

**Brief Description:**
*Describe the services offered, target population, and any important notes (e.g., "free for under 18", "LGBTQ+ friendly", "requires appointment").*

**Verification Source:**
*How did you verify this information? (e.g., "I visited the clinic last week", "Official website as of [date]", "Personal experience")*

**Additional Notes:**
*Any other relevant information.*
